channel.title: Waves for Minigame
channel.description: So i'm adding waves of NPC's to my minigame and I was wandering what I could change/edit to make it only spawn the wave one time and not spawn it once for each player in the game?

item.title: Waves for Minigame
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

All players are in one minigame? You’ll need to create a system to enter players every x unit of time, then spawn the wave from a single class instance - do not create a new instance per player but rather for per group of players.

item.description:

I have the NPC’s in said array, however when entering the minigame it is supposed to spawn 8 NPC’s but if I go in there with 3 people it spawns 24 I mean how could I change it to where upon start of the minigame it only spawns the single wave instead of the 8 for each player.

item.title: Waves for Minigame
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Keep a wave count and increase it each time the last npc from a group dies, perhaps store the NPC references in an array of sorts and if all entries are null/dead then increase the wave. As for the second you’ll need to play around with this, in Delta Jad is kept separate for each player by placing every player on a new height level.
